content.prompt: The value of which of the following would be included in the United States gross domestic product?

choices.label: Time spent volunteering at a local hospital
A United States savings bond received as a birthday gift
A movie ticket purchased at a local theater
A new handbag made in Italy by a United States firm
A used car sold at the same price paid for it

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
